# PED::HIDE_PED_BLOOD_DAMAGE_BY_ZONE

## Summary
Hides (but does not permanently remove) blood from a zone on a ped.

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** pedIndex: The index of the ped to hide bood on
* **PED_DECORATION_ZONE** zone:
The zone on the ped that needs hidden.
setting zone to 'PDZ_INVALID' will cause the hide/unhide to be applied to all zones on the ped.
* **BOOL** enable: True if we're to hide the blood, false if we should show it again

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
It can be called repeatedly to hide blood in multiple zones.
